==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{zh-l|NB}}, {{zh-l|牛B}}, {{zh-l|牛逼}}, {{zh-l|牛鼻}}, {{zh-l|牛比}}, {{zh-l|牛掰}}

===Etymology===
Literally "cow vagina"; possibly influenced by the expression {{zh-l|吹牛皮}} which means "to brag".

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=niúbī
|c=ngau4 bei1
|j=niou1 bi1
|cat=a
}}

===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# {{lb|zh|slang}} [[fucking]] [[awesome]]
#: {{zh-x|他 小說 寫 得{de} 太 牛屄{bī} 了。|The novels he writes are '''fucking awesome'''.}}
#: {{zh-x|哥們兒{r}，別 瞎 說，^美國 比 ^英國 牛屄{bī}，^美國 是 超級.大國！|Dude, don't talk shit. America's '''heaps stronger''' than Britain - U.S.A. is the superpower!}}
#: {{zh-x|這 輛 摩托車 真 牛屄{bī}，載 了 三 個 人 還 開 這麼 快。|This motorbike's '''frigging awesome'''. Even with three people it still goes pretty fast.}}
